tool_description: API provide information of movies and TV shows
title: Movies and Tv Database

api_list.name: Top Chart
api_list.description: Get list of all time most liked movies
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://movies-and-tv-database.p.rapidapi.com/topchart"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "movies-and-tv-database.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
